task_flows.flow_name: Request Air Ticket via Mobile App
steps: Choose Request Type (Reimbursement, HR/Admin Booking, or Encashment)
Navigate to Settings > Company > Air ticket policies
Configure policy behavior (request timing, renewal cycle, request limits)
Choose redeem options (Reimbursement, Encashment, Company Booking)
task_flows.source_article: Setting up an air ticket allowance policy

task_flows.flow_name: Create Air Ticket Auto Encashment Workflow
steps: Select Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
Set request details (choose application as Bayzat Payroll, select request type, assign employee)
task_flows.source_article: Air Tickets Auto Encashments via Workflows

duplicate_groups.theme: Air ticket balance and request visibility
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify air ticket UI displays correct balance information and clear request count indicators in all states (pending requests, available balance, request limits)

not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket describing system limitation (no indefinite carry-over support). No UI change to test - this is a documented platform constraint.

not_testable_tickets.summary: As an employee I want to manage my air ticket requests from my air tickets
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - feature was rejected and will not be implemented. Nothing to test.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Client is unable to remove Processed Air tickets
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - issue was already fixed. No current UI state to validate.
Permission/access control issue requiring backend role configuration and database verification. Playwright cannot validate permission scopes or data visibility restrictions.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Letter requests - upload the document after stamping
not_testable_tickets.reason: Feature request for letter requests module (not air tickets). Requires workflow state management and document handling beyond UI automation scope.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Limited access for employees to view other users
not_testable_tickets.reason: Permission and visibility control feature requiring backend role configuration and data filtering. Playwright cannot validate granular access restrictions.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Need to delete the test air tickets processed
not_testable_tickets.reason: Feature request for deletion capability of processed entries. Requires backend data deletion logic verification, not UI element testing.

not_testable_tickets.summary: Need to remove processed (Encashment) Air tickets with Payroll reopen
not_testable_tickets.reason: Ticket is marked as Resolved - the issue has already been fixed and there is nothing to test now

not_testable_tickets.summary: Restricted People manager role - can still see other employees (out of assigned group)
not_testable_tickets.reason: This is a system limitation/design decision clarified by product team. Role-based grouping intentionally only applies to finance/payroll/expense modules, not HR modules. This is not a bug to fix but a documented product constraint

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
